channel.title: Running/Compiling on Mac OS X 10.4.11
channel.description:
Hey everyone! I am running MAC OS X 10.4.11 which is Tiger. I have copied my RSPS folders to a USB and transfered from my PC to my Mac. I know Mac doesn't have .cmd and that's what PC uses. I was wondering if anyone out there knows what exactly I do to run and compile on a mac? I would give you 20% credit in my next release (since you'd technically be helping me.)
note: I have TextEdit (not Notepad like PC so I hope I can code on this)
Thank you in advance!

item.title: Running/Compiling on Mac OS X 10.4.11
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/283802-how-run-317-mac-rsps.html

Try that ;D

Read full topic
